trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> objects, and is used to hold the items of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> control and a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 物件的集合，可用來保留 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 控制項和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList" /> 控制項的項目。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: Accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Items%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.Items%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 存取<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>控制擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove items from the collection at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增或移除在執行階段集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> object inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>物件繼承自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在您管理中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>物件透過<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the selected item's index into the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.Items%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用選取的項目索引<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.Items%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains a list of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 物件清單的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> class using the provided array.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the constructor syntax to populate the new object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> objects contained in the `items` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個版本的建構函式語法來填入新的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>所包含的物件`items`參數。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the end of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入集合的結尾。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入至集合結尾的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the end of a collection with the provided string as the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 以提供的字串做為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text" /> 屬性，將項目加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new list item with the specified text and then adds it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字建立新的清單項目，然後將它加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入至集合結尾的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the end of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the syntax used, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A> method either adds the specified item to the end of the collection, or constructs a new list item with the specified text and then adds it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 根據使用的語法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>方法是將指定的項目加入至集合結尾或建構新的清單項目，以指定的文字，然後將它加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A> method to add an item named `_ml` to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Add%2A>方法，將項目具名`_ml`結尾<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available in the read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不適用於唯讀<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection>介面。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A> method for all the classes where this method applies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A>套用這個方法的所有類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>, it clears all the choices in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>集合清除所有的樣式，在集合中，或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>，它會清除集合中的所有選項。

trans-unit.source: Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位加入至控制項的物件清單的變更資料繫結行為的欄位，會要求您一次將資料繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the given item is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合內是否包含指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given item is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定項目包含在集合中則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the specified collection as a single array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定集合中當做單一 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 物件陣列的項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: An array of the items in the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定集合中項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An item to search for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中搜尋的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" /> 物件中指定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中指定之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified item as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之項目的索引為整數。

trans-unit.source: If the specified item is not in the collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的項目不在集合中，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法會傳回`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the specified location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至集合中指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.target: 索引。

trans-unit.source: The item to be inserted into the list.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至清單的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the specified location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至集合中指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `index` value must be between 0 and the size of the collection.
trans-unit.target: `index`值必須是介於 0 到集合的大小。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is the size of the collection, `item` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`是集合的大小`item`加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: This overload first creates a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object with the given string, and inserts this item.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會先建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>物件使用指定的字串，並將它插入此項目。

trans-unit.source: The index.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is tracking changes to view state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合是否正在追蹤檢視狀態的變更。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if tracking view state changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果追蹤檢視狀態變更則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的索引編號。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除在指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to a server control's view state to a <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的變更，該狀態已變更為 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the view-state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> objects as the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 物件的陣列設定為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem" /> 物件正在追蹤它的檢視狀態變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the view state information to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 物件中包含要載入的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: the view state data has been modified or corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態資料已經過修改或損毀。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the collection to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 指示集合追蹤其檢視狀態的變更。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫這個方法之後，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> will be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection>會設定為`true`。
